solutionsPage.title: Our Solutions
solutionsPage.cloudDescription: We specialize in leveraging cloud computing and artificial intelligence to provide scalable, efficient, and intelligent solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. From cloud migration to custom AI model development, we help you harness the power of modern technology.
solutionsPage.webDevDescription: Our team crafts bespoke websites and mobile applications that are not only visually stunning but also highly functional and user-friendly. We focus on creating digital platforms that drive engagement and achieve business objectives.
solutionsPage.chatbotsDescription: Transform your customer interactions and streamline operations with our custom chatbot solutions. We develop AI-driven chatbots that integrate seamlessly with landing pages and WhatsApp Business, providing 24/7 support and automating repetitive tasks.

successCasesPage.title: Our Success Stories

cookiePolicyModal.title: Navnub Cookie Policy
cookiePolicyModal.introduction: At Navnub, a leader in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and cloud-based solutions, we are dedicated to merging creativity with advanced technology to create exceptional digital experiences. This Cookie Policy explains how Navnub ('we', 'our', 'Navnub') uses cookies and similar technologies on our website, www.navnub.com.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone, etc.) when you visit a website. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size, and other display preferences) over a period, so you donât have to keep re-entering them whenever you come back to the site or browse from one page to another.

howWeUseCookies.title: 2. How Navnub Uses Cookies?
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies for various purposes, including:
howWeUseCookies.item1: Essential site functionality: To enable navigation and basic site functions, such as access to secure areas.
howWeUseCookies.item2: Enhancing user experience: To remember your preferences and settings, making your visit more efficient and personalized.
howWeUseCookies.item3: Analytics and performance: To collect information about how visitors use our website, helping us improve its performance and design.
howWeUseCookies.item4: Targeted advertising: To deliver relevant ads based on your interests and browsing behavior.
howWeUseCookies.aiNote: Navnub leverages the power of artificial intelligence to drive personalization and predictive analysis, and this extends to how we optimize user experience through cookies.

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies Used by Navnub
typesOfCookies.intro: We classify cookies into the following categories:

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies (Essential)
strictlyNecessary.content: These are fundamental for our website to function correctly. They enable site navigation and use of its features, such as access to secure areas. Without these cookies, services you request, like shopping carts or e-billing, cannot be provided. They do not require user consent as they are necessary for the site's operation.

performance.title: Performance/Analytics Cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect anonymous information about how visitors use our website (e.g., which pages they visit most often, if they encounter errors). They help us understand site performance and improve user experience. For example, we may use Google Analytics cookies to understand site traffic.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: These allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.

advertising.title: Advertising/Targeting Cookies
advertising.content: These cookies are used to deliver ads more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They are usually placed by advertising networks with the website operatorâs permission.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: Navnub may use third-party service providers to assist us with certain site functions, such as web analytics or advertising. These third parties may also place cookies on your device through our website. We do not have control over these third-party cookies. For information on how they use cookies, we recommend reviewing the privacy and cookie policies of the respective third parties.

yourConsent.title: 5. Your Consent
yourConsent.content: By accessing and using our website, we will request your consent for the use of non-essential cookies. We implement a cookie consent banner that allows you to accept, reject, or customize your cookie preferences. To be recognized as leaders in the web development industry, standing out for our ability to merge creativity with technological innovation, transparency in data use is key.

managingPreferences.title: 6. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managingPreferences.intro: You have control over your cookie preferences. You can:
managingPreferences.item1: Adjust your consent: Through the cookie banner or the privacy settings section on our website (if available).
managingPreferences.item2: Browser settings: Most web browsers allow some control over cookies through browser settings. You can set them to notify you when a cookie is sent, allowing you to accept or reject it. You can also delete already stored cookies. However, if you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function correctly.
managingPreferences.item3: Opt-out tools: You can opt-out of targeted advertising from some ad networks through links provided by the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) or the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA).

dataRetention.title: 7. Cookie Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Cookies have different lifespans. Some are 'session cookies' that are automatically deleted when you close your browser, while others are 'persistent cookies' that remain on your device for a predefined period or until you manually delete them.

policyUpdates.title: 8. Updates to This Cookie Policy
policyUpdates.content: We reserve the right to update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated Cookie Policy on our website. We recommend reviewing this page regularly to stay informed about our cookie practices.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, you can contact us through the contact means provided on our website www.navnub.com.

termsOfServicePage.introduction: Welcome to Navnub. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the services provided by Navnub, a leading company in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that merges technological innovation with cloud-based solutions and artificial intelligence.
termsOfServicePage.acceptanceIntro: By accessing or using any of Navnub's services, you ('User', 'Client') agree to be legally bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, you should not use our services.

section1.title: 1. Description of Services
section1.intro: Navnub specializes in creating innovative and technologically advanced solutions. Our services include, but are not limited to:

item1.title: Web Platform and Mobile Application Development
item1.content: Creation of websites and applications that are not only visually appealing but also functional and highly intuitive.

item2.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Projects
item2.content: Implementation of AI-based solutions to drive personalization and predictive analysis.

item3.title: Chatbots and Automations
item3.content: Development of high-quality chatbots for small and medium-sized businesses (PYMEs), with integration into landing pages and compatibility with the WhatsApp Business API. These chatbots improve customer interaction and automate repetitive tasks, resulting in greater efficiency and productivity.

item4.title: Cloud-Based Solutions
item4.content: As pioneers in the convergence of cloud and artificial intelligence, we offer scalable, customized, and highly functional solutions that drive digital transformation.

section2.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
section2.content: By contracting or using Navnub's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms, as well as our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy. These Terms constitute a binding legal agreement between you and Navnub.

section3.title: 3. User Obligations and Conduct
section3.item1: Provide truthful, complete, and updated information for the provision of services.
section3.item2: Use Navnub's services lawfully and in accordance with morality and public order.
section3.item3: Not use the services for illegal, fraudulent purposes, or purposes that may harm the reputation of Navnub or third parties.
section3.item4: Be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any access credentials provided by Navnub or created by the User.

navnubContent.title: Navnub Content
navnubContent.content: All content, design, logos, trademarks, software, and other intellectual property elements developed by Navnub are the exclusive property of Navnub or its licensors and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.

clientContent.title: Client Content
clientContent.content: The Client shall retain intellectual property ownership of all content, data, and materials provided to Navnub for the provision of services. The Client grants Navnub a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and adapt such content solely for the purpose of providing the contracted services.

specificDevelopments.title: Specific Developments
specificDevelopments.content: The intellectual property of custom developments created by Navnub for the Client will be governed by the specific agreements of each project, detailed in the corresponding service contract.

section5.title: 5. Payments and Billing
section5.content: Payment terms, fees, deadlines, and any additional charges will be specified in the individual project proposal or service contract agreed between Navnub and the Client. The Client agrees to make payments on the stipulated dates and in the stipulated forms. Failure to make payments may result in the suspension or termination of services.

section6.title: 6. Confidentiality
section6.content: Navnub and the Client commit to maintaining the confidentiality of all non-public information shared during the business relationship, including, but not limited to, trade secrets, technical, financial, marketing information, and customer data. This confidentiality obligation will remain even after the termination of services.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
section7.content: Navnub is dedicated to excellence and constant innovation and strives to offer exceptional digital experiences. However, Navnub's services are provided 'as is' and 'as available', without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. Navnub does not guarantee that the services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content: In no event shall Navnub be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including, without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the services; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the services; (iii) any content obtained from the services; and (iv) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, even if we have been informed of the possibility of such damage.

section9.title: 9. Indemnification
section9.content: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless Navnub and its directors, employees, partners, and agents, from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees), arising from: a) your use of and access to the services; b) your violation of any of these Terms; c) your violation of any third-party right, including without limitation any intellectual property, privacy, or third-party right.

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.content: Navnub may terminate or suspend your access to the services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the services will immediately cease.

section11.title: 11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section11.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the state of Florida, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising in connection with these Terms or the use of Navnub's services shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Doral, Florida, United States.

section12.title: 12. Changes to Terms
section12.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will make reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice before any new terms take effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our services after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

section13.title: 13. Contact
section13.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, you can contact Navnub through the contact means available on our website: www.navnub.com.
